data.proxyObjectName: rectangular packaged snack bar with red and yellow wrapping
data.utilizationMethod: Lay the snack bar flat; drive the fan’s base onto the wrapper until the contents compress to the table.
Stand beside the desk and drive the phone clamp straight down onto a clear spot on the desktop surface.

data.proxyObjectName: wooden-handled bench brush with black bristles
data.utilizationMethod: Wrap the hand around the narrow wooden handle right behind the bristles, then lift and tilt so the bristle block swings outward
Close fingers around the extended metal shaft near its middle, allow the phone clamp to act as the weighted head, and swing overhead in broad chopping arcs

data.proxyObjectName: small cylindrical silver metal container or calibration weight
data.utilizationMethod: Clasp the sides, lift it overhead, and knock the bottom face onto the surface
Wrap your hand around one grip of the controller and swing the opposite side inward like a curved blade
